overview: Jodi—slacker employee for more than three years, his career does not move up, with a mediocre salary—is fired from his job. Slumped when he met with friends in high school, Siku, short for Si Kunyuk (Monkey), who changed his name to Pierre. Kunyuk offers a job as a masseuse (Male Therapist). Because of desperate circumstances, he enters into the world of Male Therapist. Jodi success and become one of the most sought-after Male Therapist.  Jodi courted one of his clients, a wealthy lawyer middle-aged woman named Anet. Jodi’s life goes smoothly, until he meets Dianka, a gorgeous waitress at a fancy restaurant. Then Jodi is going out with Dianka, But, this relationship is detcted by Anet.
title: Modal Dengkul
